comment: Used to search and highlight Kinetic damage type in descriptions

value: Kinetic Damage is caused by physical impacts.
english: Kinetic Damage is caused by physical impacts.

comment: Used to search and highlight Explosive damage type in descriptions

value: Explosive Damage is caused by AoE blasts or massive heat.
english: Explosive Damage is caused by AoE blasts or massive heat.

comment: Used to search and highlight Plasma damage type in descriptions

value: Plasma Damage is caused by lasers or other high energetic waves.
english: Plasma Damage is caused by lasers or other high energetic waves.

comment: Used to search and highlight Electric damage type in descriptions

value: Electric Damage is caused by lightning or sparks.
english: Electric Damage is caused by lightning or sparks.

comment: Used to search and highlight Nuclear damage type in descriptions

value: Nuclear Damage is caused by atomic weapons or radiation. It inherently bypasses Deflector Shield.
english: Nuclear Damage is caused by atomic weapons or radiation. It inherently bypasses Deflector Shield.

comment: Used to search and highlight Thermal damage type in descriptions

value: {0}Thermal{1} Damage types are {2}Explosive{3}, {4}Plasma{5} and {6}Electric{7}.\n\nWhen damage is converted from a thermal damage type, {8}Thermal{9} Damage modifiers apply at {10} of their value.
english: {0}Thermal{1} Damage types are {2}Explosive{3}, {4}Plasma{5} and {6}Electric{7}.\n\nWhen damage is converted from a thermal damage type, {8}Thermal{9} Damage modifiers apply at {10} of their value.

comment: Used as title for Glossary entry

value: Projectiles that hit an enemy and pierce are not removed. They continue traveling along their path.
comment: Used to as description for Glossary entry
english: Projectiles that hit an enemy and pierce are not removed. They continue traveling along their path.

value: Range determines how far away enemies can be targeted and attacked with a weapon.
english: Range determines how far away enemies can be targeted and attacked with a weapon.

comment: Used as title and search string in Glossary

value:
Each point grants:

{0} increased Armor
{1} more {2}Kinetic Damage{3}
{4} reduced Acceleration
comment:
Used as description for Mass
{0}=increase armor, for instance 1%
{1}=more damage, for instance 1%
{2,3}=damage color marker
{4}=increased acceleration, for instance 1%
english:
Each point grants:

{0} increased Armor
{1} more {2}Kinetic Damage{3}
{4} reduced Acceleration

comment: Used as title and search string in Glossary

value:
Each point grants:

{0} increased Deflector Shield
{1} faster Dash Recharge
{2} more {3}Thermal{4} Damage
comment:
Used as description for Energy
{0}=increased deflector shield, for instance 1%
{1}=faster dash recharge, for instance 1%
{2}=more thermal damage, for instance 1%
{3,4}=damage color marker
english:
Each point grants:

{0} increased Deflector Shield
{1} faster Dash Recharge
{2} more {3}Thermal{4} Damage

comment: Used as title and search string in Glossary

value:
Each point grants:

{0} faster flow of time around your ship, speeding up everything in {1} range - including you, enemies, and projectiles.

Time is inherited by your Minions and Parasites.
comment: Used as description for Time\n{0}=speedup per time, e.g. 1%\n{1}=range around the player affected by time, e.g. 300
english:
Each point grants:

{0} faster flow of time around your ship, speeding up everything in {1} range - including you, enemies, and projectiles.

Time is inherited by your Minions and Parasites.

value: Deflector Shield protects your Armor from taking damage.\nDeflector Shield recharges after {0} of not taking damage. Nuclear Damage inherently bypasses Deflector Shield.
english: Deflector Shield protects your Armor from taking damage.\nDeflector Shield recharges after {0} of not taking damage. Nuclear Damage inherently bypasses Deflector Shield.

value: Velocity determines your ship's maximum movement speed.
english: Velocity determines your ship's maximum movement speed.

value: Acceleration determines how fast your ship gains speed.
english: Acceleration determines how fast your ship gains speed.

value: Pickup Range defines the distance at which Power-Ups are attracted to your ship.
english: Pickup Range defines the distance at which Power-Ups are attracted to your ship.

value: Destroying enemies has a small chance to drop a Power-Up. Collecting a Power-Up grants a temporary buff.\n\nWhen an enemy is destroyed, the highest Power-Up chance among all allies is used to determine whether a Power-Up drops.
english: Destroying enemies has a small chance to drop a Power-Up. Collecting a Power-Up grants a temporary buff.\n\nWhen an enemy is destroyed, the highest Power-Up chance among all allies is used to determine whether a Power-Up drops.

value: Dash is consumed when you use your Engine.
english: Dash is consumed when you use your Engine.

value: Your ship constantly recharges Dash. The base recharge rate is {0} per second.
english: Your ship constantly recharges Dash. The base recharge rate is {0} per second.

value: Engines are items that trigger when you Dash. Some Engines can damage enemies.
english: Engines are items that trigger when you Dash. Some Engines can damage enemies.

value: Melee weapons are engaging enemies in close-combat.
english: Melee weapons are engaging enemies in close-combat.

value: Projectiles are fired by ranged weapons. Projectiles can pierce, chain or split towards other enemies.
english: Projectiles are fired by ranged weapons. Projectiles can pierce, chain or split towards other enemies.

value: Certain items enable you to reflect a portion of incoming damage back to your attackers.
english: Certain items enable you to reflect a portion of incoming damage back to your attackers.

value: Enemies whose Armor falls below Death Threshold after taking damage are instantly destroyed.
english: Enemies whose Armor falls below Death Threshold after taking damage are instantly destroyed.

value: Increases the blast radius of weapons that deal damage in an area, allowing them to hit more enemies or cover a larger zone.
english: Increases the blast radius of weapons that deal damage in an area, allowing them to hit more enemies or cover a larger zone.

value: Enhances the damage dealt by weapons that affect an area.
english: Enhances the damage dealt by weapons that affect an area.

value: {0}Kinetic{1} hits can cause {2}Debris{3}. Debris deals {4} AoE damage in {5} radius. Debris Damage cannot trigger Debris.
english: {0}Kinetic{1} hits can cause {2}Debris{3}. Debris deals {4} AoE damage in {5} radius. Debris Damage cannot trigger Debris.

value: {0}Explosive{1} Damage from hits can cause {2}Aftershock{3}. Each Aftershock deals {4} damage of the previous hit. Aftershock can repeat up to {5} times.
english: {0}Explosive{1} Damage from hits can cause {2}Aftershock{3}. Each Aftershock deals {4} damage of the previous hit. Aftershock can repeat up to {5} times.

value: {0}Electric{1} Damage from hits can cause {2}Shock{3}. A Shock lasts {4}. Each Shock applies {5} to all Resistances. Shock can stack up to {6} times.
english: {0}Electric{1} Damage from hits can cause {2}Shock{3}. A Shock lasts {4}. Each Shock applies {5} to all Resistances. Shock can stack up to {6} times.

value: All {0}Plasma{1} Damage can {2}blind{3} enemies. Blinded enemies have {4} less damage and velocity over {5}. The effect of Blind is reduced together with its duration.
english: All {0}Plasma{1} Damage can {2}blind{3} enemies. Blinded enemies have {4} less damage and velocity over {5}. The effect of Blind is reduced together with its duration.

value: {0}Nuclear{1} Damage from hits can cause {2}Radiation{3}. Radiation deals {4} of the initial hit over {5}. Each instance of Radiation stacks.
english: {0}Nuclear{1} Damage from hits can cause {2}Radiation{3}. Radiation deals {4} of the initial hit over {5}. Each instance of Radiation stacks.

value: {0}Explosive{1} Damage adds to a stacking pool of {2}Burn{3} that deals damage over time and decays by {4} each tick.
english: {0}Explosive{1} Damage adds to a stacking pool of {2}Burn{3} that deals damage over time and decays by {4} each tick.

value: Multicrit lets you roll for extra critical strikes, adding their damage until a roll fails or the Multicrit amount is reached. Each successive critical strike in a Multicrit chain has {0} of the previous critical strike chance.
english: Multicrit lets you roll for extra critical strikes, adding their damage until a roll fails or the Multicrit amount is reached. Each successive critical strike in a Multicrit chain has {0} of the previous critical strike chance.

value: Multiluck grants additional attempts on Luck based rolls, selecting the best outcome.
english: Multiluck grants additional attempts on Luck based rolls, selecting the best outcome.

value: Luck influences the probability of chance-based triggers. Beneficial triggers are increased, while harmful ones are reduced. However, Luck usually cannot raise trigger chances above {0}.\nLuck has no effect on Damage, Dodge, Item or Power-Up drops.
english: Luck influences the probability of chance-based triggers. Beneficial triggers are increased, while harmful ones are reduced. However, Luck usually cannot raise trigger chances above {0}.\nLuck has no effect on Damage, Dodge, Item or Power-Up drops.

value: Damage over Time (DoT) applies continuous damage to a target.
english: Damage over Time (DoT) applies continuous damage to a target.

value: Enemies that have at least one Virus applied to them.
english: Enemies that have at least one Virus applied to them.

value: A Virus hacks enemies and weakens their system. By default, there is a maximum of 1 Virus per enemy.
english: A Virus hacks enemies and weakens their system. By default, there is a maximum of 1 Virus per enemy.

value: Fields apply a Buff to you and nearby allies.\n\nFields of the same type do not stack, the highest-level one takes effect.
english: Fields apply a Buff to you and nearby allies.\n\nFields of the same type do not stack, the highest-level one takes effect.

value: Each Venom Boost grants {0} increased Damage over Time.
english: Each Venom Boost grants {0} increased Damage over Time.

value: Each Turbo Boost grants {0} increased Attack Speed.
english: Each Turbo Boost grants {0} increased Attack Speed.

value: Each Shield Boost grants {0} less Damage Taken.
english: Each Shield Boost grants {0} less Damage Taken.

value: Each Focus Boost grants {0} increased Critical Strike Chance.
english: Each Focus Boost grants {0} increased Critical Strike Chance.

value: Each Forge Boost grants {0} increased Armor Repair.
english: Each Forge Boost grants {0} increased Armor Repair.

value: The total damage per second (dps) your ship is dealing to a single target, using all of its weapons.
english: The total damage per second (dps) your ship is dealing to a single target, using all of its weapons.

value: The average maximum hit you can survive.
english: The average maximum hit you can survive.

value: Your ship is destroyed when Armor reaches zero.
english: Your ship is destroyed when Armor reaches zero.

value: Chips are items that can drop in all rarities. Their affixes apply to your ship when placed into an allocated Chip Socket.
english: Chips are items that can drop in all rarities. Their affixes apply to your ship when placed into an allocated Chip Socket.

value: Drones are lightweight Minions that can be spawned by your ship.
english: Drones are lightweight Minions that can be spawned by your ship.

value: Bulwarks are heavy Minions that can be spawned by your ship.
english: Bulwarks are heavy Minions that can be spawned by your ship.

value: Minions are allies that can be spawned by your ship. Minion Power determines what percentage of your ship's offensive stats are applied to your minions.
english: Minions are allies that can be spawned by your ship. Minion Power determines what percentage of your ship's offensive stats are applied to your minions.

value: Mines are deployed by weapons and detonate on enemy contact.
english: Mines are deployed by weapons and detonate on enemy contact.

value: Parasites latch onto enemies, turning your weapons against them.
english: Parasites latch onto enemies, turning your weapons against them.

value: The higher your Dodge, the greater your chance to avoid damage entirely, up to a maximum of {0} out of 100 hits.
english: The higher your Dodge, the greater your chance to avoid damage entirely, up to a maximum of {0} out of 100 hits.

value: Avoid damage {0} out of {1} times.\nDodge cannot be higher than {2}.
english: Avoid damage {0} out of {1} times.\nDodge cannot be higher than {2}.

value: Pushes enemies back on impact. Repeated knockbacks become less effective as enemies build resistance, which fades over time.
english: Pushes enemies back on impact. Repeated knockbacks become less effective as enemies build resistance, which fades over time.

value: Projectiles that chain on hit seek a nearby enemy as their next target.
english: Projectiles that chain on hit seek a nearby enemy as their next target.

value: Projectiles that split on hit create new projectiles that seek nearby enemies as their next target.
english: Projectiles that split on hit create new projectiles that seek nearby enemies as their next target.

value: After {0}, each second a boss takes damage, it gains 1 Exhaustion Stack.\nEach Stack causes {1} more Damage taken. Maximum Stacks are {2}.
english: After {0}, each second a boss takes damage, it gains 1 Exhaustion Stack.\nEach Stack causes {1} more Damage taken. Maximum Stacks are {2}.

value: Forged in a past cycle, this item no longer exists in current timelines.\n\nUse {0} to upgrade it to the present.
english: Forged in a past cycle, this item no longer exists in current timelines.\n\nUse {0} to upgrade it to the present.

value: Increased / reduced are additive modifiers.\n\nFor example, two modifiers of {0}20%{1} increased damage and {2}30%{3} increased damage result in a total of {4}+50%{5} damage.
english: Increased / reduced are additive modifiers.\n\nFor example, two modifiers of {0}20%{1} increased damage and {2}30%{3} increased damage result in a total of {4}+50%{5} damage.

value: More / less are multiplicative modifiers.\n\nFor example, {0}50%{1} increased damage followed by {2}20%{3} more damage results in a total of 1.5 × 1.2 = 1.8, or {4}+80%{5} total damage.
english: More / less are multiplicative modifiers.\n\nFor example, {0}50%{1} increased damage followed by {2}20%{3} more damage results in a total of 1.5 × 1.2 = 1.8, or {4}+80%{5} total damage.
